properties.areaDesc: Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Altamaha Sound to Fernandina Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 20 at 1:33AM EST until February 22 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 30 kt with gusts up to
40 kt and seas 8 to 13 feet expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas 5 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Altamaha Sound to Fernandina Beach
FL out 20 NM and Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina
Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 3 AM
EST Saturday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 PM EST
this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EST SATURDAY
